meanings: (타고난) talent (for), gift (for), aptitude (for), (formal) faculty (for), (능력) ability, (천재성) genius
have a(n) talent[ability, gift, genius, aptitude] (for)

vlive.korean: [뜻밖의 재능 발견] - 뭐야! 나 잘하는데? - 잘하는데? [Unexpected talent] - What? I'm good. - He's good. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Unexpected talent] - What? I'm good. - He's good.

vlive.korean: [떡만둣국 부심] 꽤 재능 있다니깐~ [Proud of their Tteokguk with dumplings] but I'm so talented. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Proud of their Tteokguk with dumplings] but I'm so talented.

vlive.korean: 너무 재능 있어요! He's so talented! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 48 - 호주쓰!!
나야말로 정말 재능이 있나? I don't think I am talented. 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 남자가 사랑에 빠지는 과정_EP08 [라이크]
vlive.english: I don't think I am talented.

vlive.korean: [나의 숨겨진 재능...?] - 숨겨진 재능이 있었나? - 진짜로? [His hidden talent...?] - Is there a hidden talent? - Really? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.92
vlive.english: [His hidden talent...?] - Is there a hidden talent? - Really?

examples.korean: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 조직자로서 의심할 여지없는 재능을 지니고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It would be tragic if her talent remained unrecognized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 재능이 계속 인정을 못 받는다면 비극적일 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be tragic if her talent remained unrecognized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He started with nothing but raw talent and determination. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 오로지 다듬어지지 않은 재능과 투지만으로 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He started with nothing but raw talent and determination. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: By investing in education, we nourish the talents of our children. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육에 투자함으로써 우리는 우리 아동들의 재능을 키운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: By investing in education, we nourish the talents of our children. Add to Wordbook
